entry.title: Find your creative community with Dissolve Creators.

media:group.media:title: Find your creative community with Dissolve Creators.
media:group.media:description:
Start your creative journey with a community that values your growth. Join the inspiring and empowering community for creatives.
Join for free: https://dissolve.com/community Download free photos & videos: https://dissolve.com/creators/content
Video made üé• by Creator, Jacob Sulit. Jacob's IG: https://www.instagram.com/jacobsulit/ Jacob's Dissolve Creator Profile: https://dissolve.com/creators/461952df-bcdb-4785-b022-ebef185b5590

entry.title: Dissolve Challenges: Summer Moments (Prize presented by Moment)

media:group.media:title: Dissolve Challenges: Summer Moments (Prize presented by Moment)
media:group.media:description:
Stand out in the creative community with your photography skills. We‚Äôre challenging you with the shoot theme: Summer Moments.
The winner chosen will receive a $250 gift card to Moment brand products [https://www.shopmoment.com/moment]
Upload submissions to your Dissolve Creators‚Ñ¢ profile. Don't have a profile yet? Signing up is free and easy: https://dissolve.com/community
All contest details can be found here: https://dissolve.com/creators/challenges

media:group.media:title: Dissolve Challenges
media:group.media:description:
Take part in contests and giveaways that aim to help photographers, videographers, filmmakers, and designers test their skills. Get recognized for your content and win sweet prizes!
Join Dissolve Creators for free: https://dissolve.com/community Dissolve Challenges: https://dissolve.com/creators/challenges

media:group.media:title: Introducing Dissolve Creators
media:group.media:description:
Share your work with like-minded creatives, download free photos & videos, get exposed to industry pros, and win prizes. Whether you're an amateur or a pro- join the inspiring & empowering community for creatives.
Signing up is free and easy at https://dissolve.com/community

media:group.media:title: Authentically you.
media:group.media:description:
The inclusion of all people in media is crucial to educating society now, and generations to come. It is empowering to see representation of different voices and backgrounds through the imagery in advertisements, TV, and film.
At Dissolve, we are actively seeking footage and photography that expresses diversity and inclusion.
Help us represent the world, authentically. Become a Dissolve Contributor: https://contributors.dissolve.com/ _____________________________________________________________________ Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dissolvestock/ See updates on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/dissolvefootage/ Talk to us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/dissolve

entry.title: We're reaching out so you can too - Dissolve for a Cause

media:group.media:title: We're reaching out so you can too - Dissolve for a Cause
media:group.media:description:
If your studio or agency is working pro-bono for a nonprofit or charity, we want to help. This November and December, apply for Dissolve for a Cause to receive up to $1,000 in stock footage and photography.
Apply now: dissolve.com/cause

entry.title: Make it rain with our weather overlay tutorial. No water needed.

media:group.media:title: Make it rain with our weather overlay tutorial. No water needed.
media:group.media:description:
Don't wait for tangible rain, add a moody drizzle to your footage with our rain overlays. You'll get the inspiration you need to bring an old project out of the shadows or create a brand new project with our creative overlays.
No water needed.
Read the tutorial: http://ideas.dissolve.com/tips/make-your-videos-rain-with-our-weather-overlay-tutorial-no-water-needed
Download free overlay goodies: https://dissolve.com/goodies/24-and-85mm-weather-overlays

media:group.media:title: Jokester
media:group.media:description: Joker‚Äôs tragic story is re-born in our latest reel, which has been made without a big studio, or an expensive budget. Jokester was made entirely with stock footage from Dissolve. Spoilers ahead: Proceed with caution.

media:group.media:title: Everyday, Scribbled
media:group.media:description: Change your perspective on everyday objects, with Everyday, Scribbled. Associate different objects together to create a compelling story with drawing on clips and adding 3D elements. Go from a basketball hoop through to gymnastic rings, to a hula-hoop. The possibilities are endless.

media:group.media:title: Faux Shows 2
media:group.media:description:
As you wind down at the end of the day and open a go-to streaming platform, we‚Äôre all faced with the difficult task of choosing what we want to watch. Stockbuster previews feature generic genres we've all learnt to expect. Stereotypical characters we all love, ‚Äúoriginals‚Äù and binge-worthy series we've spent all weekend watching. All produced with TV-worthy stock footage from Dissolve.
Watch our other showreels: Faux Show, Summer Senses, and This Is Stock - at dissolve.com/showreels

media:group.media:title: Become a Dissolve contributor
media:group.media:description:
At Dissolve, we value premium content and we take our time to curate it. We're looking for content creators from different backgrounds that care about their work as much as we do.
We want to challenge photographers and videographers of all kinds to show us what they're made of.
Bring a spin to your passion and turn it into stock.
https://contributors.dissolve.com/apply

media:group.media:title: Stranger Stock
media:group.media:description:
Stock can be strange but it can also be versatile. To show this we‚Äôve created our very own trailer for the most binge worthy show around. Don‚Äôt be a wastoid, experience the full effect of stock footage with Stranger Stock.
Made entirely with stock footage from Dissolve.

media:group.media:title: Summer Senses
media:group.media:description: Feel the sand underneath your feet and breeze of the open road. Our latest reel of exclusive clips highlights perfectly crafted summery stock that appeals to the senses.

media:group.media:title: A to Z
media:group.media:description: Discover a library of visual building blocks with breadth that goes way beyond the basics. The Dissolve Elements‚Ñ¢ collection is a lifetime supply of stunning stock that sets up scenes and fills in the gaps. Royalty-free and ready to use in commercial productions.
